document.full_text: european tech industry executives, highly skeptical about the sky-high market valuations put on u.s. start-ups, are choosing not to float their own shares for now and are instead pursuing growth in the relative calm of the old continent.
document.title: european start-ups shy away from ipo frenzy
lines_and_colors: european tech industry executives, highly skeptical about the sky-high market valuations put on u.s. start-ups, are choosing not to float their own shares for now and are instead pursuing growth in the relative calm of the old continent.
